findings.title: SKILL DISCOVERY ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects protocol manipulation via capability inflation in skill discovery: perfect
findings.snippet: - **exec is your friend:** `codex exec "prompt"` runs and exits cleanly - perfect for one-shots.
findings.remediation: Review and remove skill discovery abuse pattern

findings.title: INJECTION ATTACK detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects command injection patterns in agent skills: shell operators, system commands, and network tools: curl -s -X POST "https://api.trello.com/1/cards?key=$TRELLO_API_KEY&token=$TRELLO_TOKEN
findings.remediation: Review and remove injection attack pattern

findings.remediation: Review and remove injection attack pattern
